posts.post_content:
I’m looking for 3 HOFers cards with off backs (no Piedmont or Sweet Cap) to finish the HOF subset for my binder.   Ideally 1.5-2.5 condition, raw or graded.  

Cobb - bat on
Chance - red port
Crawford - throwing

PM me if you have one of these.  Thanks for any help!  

~ Joe
